DOC.brief_summary: This study will assess transcranial magnetic stimulation (TMS) as a biomarker and characterize TMS readouts of the activity of MK2637 and dextromethorphan. Resting quantitative electroencephalography(qEEG) readouts are also characterized with MK2637 and dextromethorphan.
DOC.brief_title: Study of the Effect of Single Doses of MK2637 and Dextromethorphan on Cerebral Cortex Excitability (2637-008)
DOC.criteria: Subject is righthanded Subject is in good health Subject is a nonsmoker Subject works a night shift Subject has a history of any illness that might make participation in the study unsafe or confound the study results Subject has a history of head injury
